mapper.insert: INSERT INTO restcomm_call_detail_records (sid, parent_call_sid, date_created, date_updated, account_sid, recipient, sender, phone_number_sid, status, start_time, end_time, duration, price, direction, answered_by, api_version, forwarded_from, caller_name, uri) VALUES (#{sid}, #{parent_call_sid}, #{date_created}, #{date_updated}, #{account_sid}, #{to}, #{from}, #{phone_number_sid}, #{status}, #{start_time}, #{end_time}, #{duration}, #{price}, #{direction}, #{answered_by}, #{api_version}, #{forwarded_from}, #{caller_name}, #{uri});
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM restcomm_call_detail_records WHERE start_timegt;=#{start_time} AND start_time<DATE_ADD(#{start_time},INTERVAL 1 DAY);
mapper.update: UPDATE restcomm_call_detail_records SET date_updated=#{date_updated}, status=#{status}, start_time=#{start_time}, end_time=#{end_time}, duration=#{duration}, price=#{price}, answered_by=#{answered_by} WHERE sid=#{sid};
